text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, 'iidha eaqadtum ealaa alnisa' walam tadkhuluu bihina thuma talaqtumuhuna min qabl 'an tjamewhn, fama lakum ealayhina min eddat thswnha elyhn, faetwhn min 'amwalukum mtet ytmten biha bhsb alwse jbrana lkhwatrhn, wkhllu sbylhn mae alstr aljmyl, dun 'adhana 'aw drr
